name: Babe and Friends
description: Babe stars in his first adventure for PlayStation 2, based on the classic family movies from Universal Pictures! It's a very special day for Babe! The brave little sheep-pig has been invited to take part in a grand tournament, where the best sheep-herders from around the world will compete for ultimate glory. But there's one problem: the tournament is many miles away in the big city! Can you guide Babe and his sheep safely to the big city and win the competition?
